definition: to pass/to spend (time)/measure/limit/extent/degree of intensity/degree (angles, temperature etc)/kilowatt-hour/classifier for events and occurrences
"house on a cliff" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 53), occurring in 店, 序, 底 etc
twenty (20), in a limited number of set expressions/also written using banker's character 念
(once) again/also/both... and.../and yet/(used for emphasis) anyway
for a time/at one time/one time/once

sentences.english: The critical question is one of scale and degree, " said Nutt, the chairman of the government's Advisory Council on the Misuse of Drugs.
sentences.chinese: 关键问题是如何掌握好它的度和量。

sentences.english: Immediate turn right 90 degrees, fast moving target at 12 o'clock.
sentences.chinese: 立即右转90度快速移动目标在正前方。

sentences.english: One of the triangle's basic angles is 60 degrees.
sentences.chinese: 这个三角形其中的一个底角是60度。

sentences.english: The influence of reaction conditions on the degree of substitution of acetylated starche was investigated.
sentences.chinese: 研究了反应条件对产品取代度和结构的影响。

sentences.english: Nucleon density Instrument can test its compactness rapidly.
sentences.chinese: 核子密度仪可快速获得其压实度。

sentences.english: A weight in percentage represents the degree of similarity.
sentences.chinese: 百分比形式的权重代表的是相似度。

sentences.english: For hydrophilic materials, the contact angle will be lower than 90 degrees.
sentences.chinese: 亲水性材料的接触角度会低于90度。

sentences.english: Note the 2x102 degree horizontal beam width.
sentences.chinese: 请注意2x102度水平波束宽度。

sentences.english: A relatively high exposure to the U.S. consumer.
sentences.chinese: 在美国消费者中相对高的曝光度。

sentences.english: In low cost situation, completes the high smoothness of the DSO channel design.
sentences.chinese: 在低成本情况下，完成高平坦度的DSO通道设计。

sentences.english: Artists who try to keep his uniform degree of light and shade in painting.
sentences.chinese: 那位美术家尽力保持他绘画中明暗度的均匀。

sentences.english: The 120-degree CCPM is by far most popular among pilots of all levels.
sentences.chinese: 在各层水平的飞手中，目前120度十字盘最为流行。

sentences.english: A short distance from Moscow, the temperature had already dropped to minus 4 degrees Celsius. On November 3, the winter's first snow came.
sentences.chinese: 刚出莫斯科城，气温就降到摄氏零下4度。

sentences.english: It was concluded that it is imperative to set up standard on evaluation of sludge compost maturity.
sentences.chinese: 指出在我国建立一套堆肥腐熟度评价标准势在必行。

sentences.english: Use the stream strategy to support the granularity of distribution being undertaken.
sentences.chinese: 使用流策略支持发布的颗粒度。

definition: point/dot/drop/speck/o'clock/point (in space or time)/to draw a dot/to check on a list/to choose/to order (food in a restaurant)/to touch briefly/to hint/to light/to ignite/to pour a liquid drop by drop/(old) one fifth of a two-hour watch 更[geng1]/dot stroke in Chinese characters/classifier for items
five degrees/fifth (basic musical interval, doh to soh)
second (unit of time)/arc second (angular measurement unit)/(coll.) instantly
difference/discrepancy/to differ/error/to err/to make a mistake
to differ from/to fall short of/lacking/wrong/inferior/Taiwan pr. [cha1]
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
low/beneath/to lower (one's head)/to let droop/to hang down/to incline
up and down/top and bottom/old and new/length/about
whole entity/entire body/synthesis/as a whole (situation, construction, team etc)/global/macrocosm/integral/holistic/whole
to be on the low side/to be inadequate (e.g. of a salary)
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
